00028 Implemente_instanciable( Interpolation_IBM_hybrid, "Interpolation_IBM_hybride|IBM_hybride", Interpolation_IBM_elem_fluid ) ;
00029 // XD interpolation_ibm_hybride interpolation_ibm_elem_fluid ibm_hybride 1 Immersed Boundary Method (IBM): hybrid (fluid/mean gradient) interpolation.
00030 
00031 Sortie& Interpolation_IBM_hybrid::printOn( Sortie& os ) const
00032 {
00033   Objet_U::printOn( os );
00034   return os;
00035 }
00036 
00037 Entree& Interpolation_IBM_hybrid::readOn( Entree& is )
00038 {
00039 // Interpolation_IBM_elem_fluid::readOn(is);
00040   Param param(que_suis_je());
00041   Interpolation_IBM_elem_fluid::set_param(param);
00042   param.ajouter("est_dirichlet",&is_dirichlet_lu_,Param::REQUIRED);   //!< XD_ADD_P field_base Node field of booleans indicating whether the node belong to an element where the interface is
00043   param.ajouter("elements_solides",&solid_elems_lu_,Param::REQUIRED); //!< XD_ADD_P field_base Node field giving the element number containing the solid point
00044   param.lire_avec_accolades_depuis(is);
00045   return is;
00046 }
00047 
00048 void Interpolation_IBM_hybrid::discretise(const Discretisation_base& dis, Zone_dis_base& la_zone_EF)
00049 {
00050   Cerr << "(IBM) Warning! Interpolation IBM_hybrid has no validation test case." << finl;
00051 
00052   Interpolation_IBM_elem_fluid::discretise(dis,la_zone_EF);
00053 
00054   dis.discretiser_champ("champ_sommets",la_zone_EF,"solid_elems","none",1,0., solid_elems_);
00055   solid_elems_.valeur().affecter(solid_elems_lu_);
00056   dis.discretiser_champ("champ_sommets",la_zone_EF,"is_dirichlet","none",1,0., is_dirichlet_);
00057   is_dirichlet_.valeur().affecter(is_dirichlet_lu_);
00058 
00059   computeSommetsVoisins(la_zone_EF, solid_points_, corresp_elems_);
00060 }
